name: DesignIT
description:
DesignIT
____________

This is my new project.This game is so easy to play !

There you can find your creative spirit and you can build(design) your dream house
In future you can find :
> Other peoples an AI
> Inventory and furniture shop (Now is CREATIVE MOD)
> Multiplayer system

(There is FULL HQ GRAPHIC )

YOU NEED TO NOW THAT THIS IS ONLY A LITTLE TASTE OF THE FULL GAME :)
BE HAPPY,BE POSITIVE, BE CREATIVE !!!

If you have any suggestion or have idea what next to add ... comment bellow :)
